data.comment: The match has started, with Venlo kicking-off.
Goal! Robbert de Vos gives Emmen a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 20, At De Oude Meerdijk, Guus Hupperts has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Venlo's Danny Post has been booked in Emmen.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Emmen kick-off.
It's now 2-0 in Emmen as Marko Kolar scores for Emmen.
Giorgos Giakoumakis puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 50, That's a fine assist from Joshua John.
Hans De Koning is making the team's first substitution at De Oude Meerdijk with Simon Janssen replacing Guus Hupperts.
Venlo have been awarded a penalty in Emmen...
In the minute 64, Michael Chacon (Emmen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Giorgos Giakoumakis levels the score at 2-2 from the penalty spot.
Chris Kum for Venlo has been booked by Siemen Mulder and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 72, Giorgos Giakoumakis scores to make it 2-3 at De Oude Meerdijk.
Goal! The home team draw level at 3-3 through Nikolai Laursen.
Great play from Marko Kolar to set up the goal.
In the minute 86, Marko Kolar (Emmen) has received a yellow card from Siemen Mulder.
Jafar Arias is replacing Giorgos Giakoumakis for Venlo at De Oude Meerdijk.
Dick Lukkien (Emmen) is making a first substitution, with Sekou Sidibe replacing Robbert de Vos.
The match has come to a close in Emmen. The final score is 3-5.
It's now 3-4 thanks to an own goal from Tobias Pachonik.
The home team have replaced Keziah Veendorp with Nick Bakker. This is the second substitution made today by Dick Lukkien.
Venlo take a comfortable 3-5 lead thanks to Jafar Arias.
